enchantment.progressions.smoke_mastery.d: 5% chance per level to auto-smoke killed entities and dupe drops.
enchantment.progressions.beheading.desc: 5% chance per level for entity head drops.
enchantment.progressions.pyromania.desc: Deals 10% extra damage per level to entities on fire.
enchantment.progressions.deep_miner.desc: Increases mining speed by 5% per level when below Y level 32.
enchantment.progressions.satiety.desc: 10% chance per level to replenish hunger upon entity kill.
enchantment.progressions.glimmering.desc: Piglins won't target you as if you have gold armor effect.
5% chance per level for lightning strike on target.
enchantment.progressions.wisdom.desc: Multiplies XP from blocks & kills by enchantment level.
